articles.title: How is the pandemic affecting mental health in young Americans?
articles.description: Isolation, stress or even loss of loved ones due to the Covid-19 pandemic are all having an effect on mental health, especially among young Americans. CNN's Pamela Brown has more.

articles.title: Grammys 2021 performers will include Taylor Swift, BTS and Billie Eilish
articles.description: It's official -- Taylor Swift, BTS and Billie Eilish are among those who will be performing at the 2021 Grammys.

articles.author: By Lilit Marcus, CNN
articles.title: She's the first female tour guide in Afghanistan, but she's determined not to be the last
articles.description: Fatima, a 22-year-old college student in Herat, is the only woman tour guide in Afghanistan. But if she gets her way, she won't be the last.

articles.title: Experts warn of coronavirus superspreader spike
articles.description: CNN's Natasha Chen says officials across the US are warning of superspreader spikes as some states rollback Covid-19 safety precautions and reports of large gatherings increase.

articles.author: Marlon Sorto, Hira Humayun and Susannah Cullinane, CNN
articles.title: Equatorial Guinea blasts kill more than 12, injure hundreds
articles.description: Explosions in Equatorial Guinea killed more than a dozen people and injured hundreds on Sunday, according to the Central African country's health ministry.

articles.title: Canada Post is sending every household a postcard to send to a loved one for free
articles.description: Canada Post is sending a free prepaid postcard to every household in the country to help citizens stay connected during the continuation of the Covid-19 pandemic.

articles.title: Pope Francis visits Iraqi church once attacked by ISIS
articles.description: During his historic trip to Iraq, Pope Francis traveled to the northern part of the country where he visited several sites that had been attacked by ISIS. CNN's Ben Wedeman has more.

articles.author: Heather Law and Susannah Cullinane, CNN
articles.title: NYC deputies shut down an unlicensed warehouse club with more than 100 partygoers inside
articles.description: New York City deputies shut down an illegal warehouse party in Queens overnight Saturday, clearing more than 100 people inside, the New York City Sheriff's Office says.
